ğŸª„ èªªæ˜ Description ğŸª„
â€‹â€‹Apache Beam, an open-source solution for batch and streaming data processing pipelines, simplifies large-scale data processing dynamics based on a unified programming model. In addition, projects that are based on Apache Beam are often properly-sized, this makes the work to be implemented in a short duration, so interns are suitable for this type of work.

The speaker will introduce Apache Beam and provide their experience on intern project planning along with the expectation and business impact consideration. If you want to know what it is and what problems are solved by Apache Beam, or if you want to learn how to design an (intern) project, this talk is for you.

title: How to Design a Successful (Intern) Project with Apache Beam?
